sys_ux_client_script.name: Retrieve Order Sys Id

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_125f0b44475a3110036bbce5536d43d6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Create Default">2ad63bc7470a3110036bbce5536d4385</macroponent><name>Retrieve Order Sys Id</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    //Retrieve Order Sys Id
    const orderData = event.payload.data.output.data.GlideRecord_Mutation.insert_sn_ind_tmt_orm_order;
    const orderId = orderData.sys_id.value;
    api.setState('orderSysId',orderId);

    //Refresh Order Number DB
    if(orderId != undefined || orderId != '')
        api.data.get_order_number_db.refresh();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-30 19:43:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>125f0b44475a3110036bbce5536d43d6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Retrieve Order Sys Id</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace" source="x_876519_att_work">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_125f0b44475a3110036bbce5536d43d6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-30 19:43:53</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
